column5: Beautiful car as well as the color !
That is beautiful! I love it .
Nice car ! I have a 99 a6 with a 4.2 as well . :)
Greatly appreciate it I will get info on that when I go see it ! :)

Oh wow ! Thanks for letting me know I will for sure do that and look out for it . From the pictures it almost seems to be in really great shape interior and exterior wise. Hopefully when I see it in person it’s as good as the pics .

Gotcha ! My family actually owns a shop so it will for sure go straight there for an inspection just wanted some insight for certain things the TT may have at fault . We have a couple other Audi’s but this will be the first tt . And thank you !
I tried that too , didn’t work :( for now I unplugged the fuses for the Flashers until I can further look into it . But thanks !
Thanks I will look into that !

Someone else can correct me if I’m wrong but as far as I know I don’t think you have to change it to your specific year . I have an 04 c240 and it’s equivalent to the same years as 02-07 . With the c class. Hope this helps.  (Equivalent as in the same bodystyle)
